peaktable.description: Provide a peaktable containing information on molecular features.

msms.description: Provide a file with molecular feature MS/MS information.

phenotype.description: Provide a file with phenotype/biological activity information. All data must come from the same type of experiment (e.g. percentage inhibition).

group_metadata.description: Provide a file with group metadata information.

spectral_library.description: Provide a spectral library file with annotated MS/MS spectra.

fold_difference.description: Factor to retain metabolites present in samples with sub-inhibitory concentrations.

mass_dev_ppm.description: Expected mass deviation tolerance in ppm.

msms_frag_min.description: Minimum number of fragments per MS/MS spectrum.

column_ret_fold.description: Factor to retain metabolites that were detected in sample blanks due to cross-contamination

fragment_tol.description: Tolerance when matching two MS/MS fragments in spectral similarity matching, in m/z units.

spectral_sim_score_cutoff.description: Similarity score cutoff: determine relatedness of two  MS2 spectra.

max_nr_links_spec_sim.description: In spectral similarity/molecular network calculations, max. number of links to other molecular features any mol. feature is allowed to have.

min_nr_matched_peaks.description: For spectral similarity matching, minimum number of fragments two MS/MS spectra need to share to be considered related.

spectral_sim_network_alg.description: For spectral similarity matching, spectral similarity/molecular networking algorithm to use.

ms2query.description: Settings to enable/disable annotation by MS2Query.

rel_int_range.description: Filter out molecular features that are outside of range.
